patthana23.6:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.6:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana23.6:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.6:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana23.6:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.6:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
